text: Li Sigrid Andersson (born 13 May 1987)Auvinen, Suvi: Historian jäänteistä kohti nykyaikaa. is a Finnish politician. She was the Minister of Education from 2019 to 2023. She has been the leader of the Left Alliance since 2016. She has been a Member of Parliament since 2015. In September 2023, Andersson announced her candidacy for President of Finland in the 2024 election. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Turku
title: Li Andersson
